item.title: Counting Sort
item.description: Characteristics Non negative integers with a known maximum value Counting sort can be applied if the input numbers are in the set {0, 1, .. ,k}, a set of non negative integers with a maximum value k. No comparisons between elements There are no comparisons between input elements that take place in counting sort. It uses array indexing to determine the relative order of the input numbers. It identifies the relative positions of each input element.
